name: Silent Bill 2022
description:
Silent Bill

Escape room style point and click. Escape from the ducks holding you hostage.

This game does not have jump scares.

How do I play

Click on things and drag things around. Click on the arrows to navigate.

If you want to quit, hold down escape.

What's happening?

Silent Bill is currently in (extremely slow) development. This build features two rooms to escape from.

I might make more. I might not. I don't know.

Silent Bill is a remake of an old jam game I made (it's better though, I promise). Here's the old game if you wanted to check it out: https://eatkin.itch.io/silent-bill-jam-version
